price: Ԑmma moadwen nnyε mo sε wͻn a yaku wͻn wͻ Nyankopͻn kwan soͻ no awuwu. Daabi, wͻ’te ase wͻ wͻn Wura Nyankopͻn hͻ a yεbͻ wͻn akͻnhoma.
arabic: وَلَا تَحۡسَبَنَّ ٱلَّذِينَ قُتِلُواْ فِي سَبِيلِ ٱللَّهِ أَمۡوَٰتَۢاۚ بَلۡ أَحۡيَآءٌ عِندَ رَبِّهِمۡ يُرۡزَقُونَ

version.title: Ashanti Translation
version.description: Translation of the Quran meanings into Ashanti by Sheikh Haroun Ismaeel

meta.transliteration: walā taḥsabanna alladhīna qutilū fī sabīli al-lahi amwātan bal aḥyāon ʿinda rabbihim yur'zaqūna
